import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import {SingleDBJob ,SingleDBJobAnalyis} from './SingleData' import "./SingleJob.css" import { baseUrl } from '../Variables' function SingleJob() { let { id } = useParams() const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(()=>{ if(parseInt(id) !== parseInt(SingleDBJob.id)) return navigate("/"); },) return (
) } function BringSingleJob({wholeData}){ const data = wholeData.SingleDBJob; const dataAnalyis = wholeData. // console.log(data.SingleDBJob.id ) // const [ specificData,setSpecificData] = useState(data) console.log(data) return(<>   See All Jobs

{data.jobTitle}

{data.details}

{/* */}
Diploma Takhar, Afghanistan (Takhar) Full Time 19
{/* col-4 started */}
{dataAnalyis && dataAnalyis.map((item)=>{
{item} Apr 22, 2024
})}
{/* col-4 finished */} {/* /////////////////////////////////////////////////// */} {/* col-8 started */}
{/* start content */}
About {data.aboutCompany.title} Company

{data.aboutCompany.discription}

Job Summary

{data.jobSummary}

    {data.dutiesAndResposibilities.map((item)=>(
  • {item}
    • ))}

    {data.jobRequirement.map((item)=>(
  • {item}
    • ))}

  • {item}
    • ))}

{data.functionalArea.map((item)=>( ))}

Contries

{data.countries.map((item)=>( ))}

Provinces

{data.province.map((item)=>( ))}

Submission Email

{data.email.map((item)=>( {item} ))}

{/* Finished content */}
{/* col-8 finished */}
) } export default SingleJob
